recommendations: Othman Al-Qenaei ‚ÄúI've worked with Mohammad for almost 4 years whether under his direct supervision in Marketing & Products Development or as a peer colleague in my current position as Enterprise Director. During that time Mohammad has constantly shown diligence and sharp acumen in any project he undertakes. He always delivers his projects with positive results and on time. On the social level, he is a people person, a team player with excellent communication skills in local and international business matters. I wish him all the best.‚Äù

Waseem Nawaz ‚ÄúIt is rare that you come across standout talent like Mohamad. I had the pleasure of working with him for 5 years at VIVA Telecom as a peer and subsequently as my immediate Supervisor. Mohamad's ability to juggle multiple projects was unprecedented. He is an organised professional, pragmatic leader and realist who seems to grasp ideas holistically whilst still taking note to the more acute details. His strong analytical, presentation and communication skills distinguished him from other colleagues at VIVA. Mohamad would be an asset to any organisation.‚Äù
